item.title: Eli Lilly Booms, Then Busts: Stellar Guidance vs Hims Undercut
item.description: Investors had little time to celebrate Eli Lilly's huge post-earnings gain. While Hims & Hers Health knocked shares down, LLY remains a healthcare sta...

item.title: McDonald’s Earnings Could Cement Its Defensive Appeal
item.description: McDonald’s will report earnings on Feb. 11 with MCD stock near a 52-week high; here’s what investors should watch on traffic, guidance, and valuation

item.title: Affirm Earnings Beat Highlights Growth and Credit Concerns
item.description: Affirm beat earnings estimates as revenue jumped 48%, but rising loan loss provisions highlight growing BNPL credit risks for AFRM stock

item.title: Symbotic’s Earnings Beat Reignites Upside Talk
item.description: Symbotic is accelerating deployment, revenue, and profitability in 2026, and analysts are taking note, leading this stock back to record highs.

item.title: Amazon’s Earnings Miss Was Small, But the Market’s Message Wasn’t
item.description: Amazon’s earnings miss and heavy spending plans rattled investors, but for long-term believers, a post-earnings dip might turn into an opportunity.
